description:
The Girl receiving a Cake is the granddaughter of the http://anidb.net/ch40160 [Old Lady] who sends her a herring flaky pastry via http://anidb.net/ch11210 [Kiki]`s delivery service.
To Kiki`s surprise, this girl is anything but happy about the present as she hates herring flaky pastry. Even worse, Kiki got into a thunderstorm while executing this order and misses out on the invitation to a party by http://anidb.net/ch13886 [Tombo] because of this.
name: Cake no Otome
